altername_name: The Wild Chicks and the Hunt for the Ruby Heart
Wilden Huehner und die Jagd nach dem Rubinherz, Die
name: Die Wilden Huehner und die Jagd nach dem Rubinherz
overview: The game is about five girls who have to get the money for their school trip together. After the girls come back, they find a buried treasure and uncover the secret. You have to master seven different games. You can determine the level of difficulty yourself.
